lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump’s introduction of Mr. Pence as his running mate was a remarkable reminder that, ultimately, the Trump campaign is about one person.

byline.contributor: Ashley Parker contributed reporting from Zionsville, Ind.

headline.print_headline: Trump Delivers a Long, Passionate Speech. He Introduces Pence, Too.
headline.main: Donald Trump Delivers a Long, Passionate Speech. He Introduces Mike Pence, Too.

snippet: Mr. Trump’s introduction of Mr. Pence as his running mate was a remarkable reminder that, ultimately, the Trump campaign is about one person....
abstract: Donald J Trump risks overshadowing Indiana Gov Mike Pence, speaking for 28 minutes before introducing his newly chosen running mate at formal event; Pence's speech elides obvious differences between two men, focusing on his biography and  unifying party against Hillary Clinton.
